title: godoc should allow OS selection
body:
by **borman@google.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. open a browser to godoc
2. go to the os package
3. click on Fd

On http://golang.org/pkg/os/#File.Fd I see:

    func (file *File) Fd() int
    Fd returns the integer Unix file descriptor referencing the open file.

on http://gopher.mtv.corp.google.com:6060/pkg/os/#File.Fd I see:

    func (file *File) Fd() syscall.Handle
    Fd returns the Windows handle referencing the open file.

Either godoc should present all OS versions or it should allow you to set a preference. 
Having it "randomly" select is not terribly helpful (unless it happened to
match your environment at the time :-)
